item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Amy Sedaris
item.description: "Accentuaute the positives - medicate the negatives." -- Amy Sedaris

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Amy Sedaris
item.description: "My mother always said 'Don't bother other people.' I think that's good advice." -- Amy Sedaris

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Amy Sedaris
item.description: "Sometimes losing a pet is more painful than losing a human because in the case of the pet, you were not pretending to love it." -- Amy Sedaris

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by William S. Burroughs
item.description: "There is no intensity of love or feeling that does not involve the risk of crippling hurt. It is a duty to take this risk, to love and feel without defense or reserve." -- William S. Burroughs

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by William S. Burroughs
item.description: "I don't care if people hate my guts; I assume most of them do. The important question is whether they are in a position to do anything about it." -- William S. Burroughs

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by William S. Burroughs
item.description: "Never do business with a religious son-of-a-bitch. His word ain't worth a shit -- not with the Good Lord telling him how to fuck you on the deal." -- William S. Burroughs

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Allen Ginsberg
item.description: "The weight of the world is love. Under the burden of solitude, under the burden of dissatisfaction the weight,the weight we carry is love. " -- Allen Ginsberg

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Allen Ginsberg
item.description: "I don't think there is any truth. There are only points of view. " -- Allen Ginsberg

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Ted Hughes
item.description: "Applause is the beginning of abuse" -- Ted Hughes

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Amy Bloom
item.description: "Everyone has two memories. The one you can tell and the one that is stuck to the underside of that, the dark, tarry smear of what happened." -- Amy Bloom

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "If you're lonely when you're alone, you're in bad company." -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "Man is condemned to be free; because once thrown into the world, he is responsible for everything he does. It is up to you to give [life] a meaning." -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Jean Paul Sarte
item.description: "Like all dreamers I confuse disenchantment with truth." -- Jean Paul Sarte

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "In love, one and one are one." -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "There may be more beautiful times, but this one is ours." -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "She believed in nothing. Only her scepticism kept her from being an atheist." -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "Smooth and smiling faces everywhere, but ruin in their eyes." -- Jean-Paul Sartre
